attributes.action: EVACUATE 10,000 AT-RISK WOMEN & GIRLS FROM AFGHANISTAN TO BE EDUCATED IN THE UK
attributes.additional_details: After wasting precious blood and treasure in Afghanistan for the past two decades, Britain – along with Nato allies – simply deserted the long suffering people to the brutality of puritanical zealots. For 20 years, the UK championed democracy & human rights only to lamely hand over the country to its former religious tyrants. Britain must tangibly show its lasting commitment to gender parity – in the face of vile Taliban sexism – by sponsoring 10,000 at-risk young women to be educated in the UK.
attributes.background: Britain's shameful retreat from Afghanistan has gifted that war-torn country to the misogynist Taliban, who viciously opposes female equality. To redeem itself, the UK must welcome a minimum of 10,000 bright Afghan women to pursue their education here. This partly atones for Britain's ugly betrayal.
